title: Mobile-Based Graphic Design Project Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Design principles and basic software usage experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners complete two graphic design projects using a mobile learning platform.
Learners produce visual storytelling outputs using tools provided by a mobile app.
Learners collaborate with peers during the PBL process and conduct design feedback at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
